Detailed Description

template<typename T, unsigned int D, unsigned int i, unsigned int nextCheck>
struct kche_tree::BoundedMapReduce< T, D, 0, i, nextCheck >

Base case specialization for the bounded map-reduce operation: BoundCheckFreq = 0. Raise an assertion to avoid an infinite loop.
